entry.name: Radius
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: radius
Description: AI sound radius

entry.name: Duration
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: lifeFrame
Description: Time for AI sound to remain

entry.name: Is Affected by Sound Radius Magnification
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: bSpEffectEnable
Description: Whether it is affected by the special effect "Sound Radius Magnification"

entry.name: Rate Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: type
Description: AI sound type

entry.name: Target: Hostile
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: opposeTarget
Description: Target: ● Hostile

entry.name: Target: Friendly
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: friendlyTarget
Description: Target: ○ Allies

entry.name: Target: Self
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: selfTarget
Description: Target: myself

entry.name: Disable on Targeting Player
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: disableOnTargetPCompany
Description: You can't listen while targeting your PC

entry.name: Rank
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: rank
Description: Character behavior (former: sound type)

entry.name: Forget Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: forgetTime
Description: Time to forget the sound target (overwrite) [sec]

entry.name: Priority
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: priority
Description: AI sound priority

entry.name: Sound Behavior ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: soundBehaviorId
Description: Behavior ID

entry.name: AI Sound Level
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: aiSoundLevel
Description: How hard it is to hear

entry.name: Replanning State
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: replaningState
Description: AI state setting to run replanning when listening to AI sound
